title: Predicting #1 Cigars & The Care Package Returns
itunes:title: Predicting #1 Cigars & The Care Package Returns
description:
It’s time for another fun episode of the Internets #1 cigar podcast. This week on the show we feature the first cigar from the December care package, Azan Burgundy.

Speaking of the Care Package, it has returned. If you are already a member there is no need to sign back up. Your membership remains, however we sold out of the initial 500 members. Today we open it up until Dec. 31st or we hit 1,000 total members.

We will also offer our predictions on what the #1 cigar of the year will be for Cigar Aficionado, Cigar Journal, Cigar Snob and the Cigar Media Association.

All this and so much more on The Cigar Authority
